Description: Pottery lamp. Applied vertical band-handle. Discus decorated with St Andrew's cross with letters(?) between the arms. Shoulder: above a row of raised points, Greek retrograde inscription. Cross on nozzle-top. Pointed oval base. Brown clay, with mica; traces of orange slip. Handle lost.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (2221)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
